thread.title: BRIEF-Mueller Industries Says Entered Employment Agreement With Gregory Christopher, Pursuant To Which He Will Continue To Serve As CEO

title: BRIEF-Mueller Industries Says Entered Employment Agreement With Gregory Christopher, Pursuant To Which He Will Continue To Serve As CEO
text: Market News March 19, 2018 / 8:43 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Mueller Industries Says Entered Employment Agreement With Gregory Christopher, Pursuant To Which He Will Continue To Serve As CEO Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 19 (Reuters) - Mueller Industries Inc: * MUELLER INDUSTRIES - ON MARCH 15, CO ENTERED EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT WITH GREGORY CHRISTOPHER, PURSUANT TO WHICH HE WILL CONTINUE TO SERVE AS COâ€™S CEO * MUELLER INDUSTRIES - EMPLOYMENT AGREEMENT PROVIDES THAT CHRISTOPHER TO RECEIVE BASE SALARY OF NOT LESS THAN $1.1 MILLION PER YEAR - SEC FILING Source text: ( bit.ly/2FWl8RB ) Further company coverage:
